channel.title: Object Tele Problem! Please Help!

item.title: Object Tele Problem! Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @killnhonor killnhonor
item.description:
@killnhonor wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve been facing a problem that has been driving me nuts! Okay so I added a spirit tree with the “teleport” option and it looks like this:

case 1294: c.getPA().startTeleport2(3243, 3177, 0); c.startAnimation(4731); c.teleTimer = 9; c.gfx0(1228); c.teleEndAnimation = 715;
Now everything works perfect EXCEPT for the fact that it only teleports when i get to the side or south side of the object. Why is this?? and how can i change it?!?!?
Pleaseee help!
Thanks, KillnHonor

Read full topic
